  .. index::

     single: capable of part of; RO_0002216

RO_0002216 - capable of part of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for capable of part of

    has function in


.. topic:: Definition

    c stands in this relationship to p if and only if there exists some p' such that c is capable_of p', and p' is part_of p.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
